From: ' 
To: Christian Everdell 
,  "Laura 
Menninger" 
Cc: ' " 
"'ll(IJSANI,6> 
Subject: Dietz/Loftus redactions 
Date: Tue, 23 Nov 2021 20:08:07 +0000 
Attachments: Ex._1_[proposed_redactions].pdf 
Counsel, 
The Court ordered us to docket and propose redactions to the Dietz/Loftus briefing and the Court's Order. We are only 
proposing redactions to Exhibit 2 to your response, as attached. 
Assuming you have no other redactions, we'll plan to file a cover letter and send our proposed redactions to the Court. 
You can then docket the redacted version of your response at your convenience today. 
Thanks, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
1 Saint Andrews Plaza 
New York, New York 10007 
EFTA00016620
